tuv.seg: You should arrange accommodation before you arrive in Ireland, even for the first few days of your stay
Má's féidir leat an lóistín a shocrú roimh ré, fiú don chéad cúpla lá ní bheidh tú chomh buartha

Organise in advance to stay with friends or book yourself in to a hotel or a hostel in order to give yourself time to look around and get to grips with the accommodation situation in the area in which you plan to live
Socraigh roimh ré fanacht le cáirde, nó cuir óstán nó brú in áirithe, le seans a thabhairt duit féin féachaint thart agus scéal an íostais san áit go bhfuil tú ag maireachtáil, a mheas
If you are thinking of buying a house, you need to be aware of the price trends in this country, the process by which houses are bought and sold and the initial costs that are involved
Caithfidh tú a bheith san airdeall ar chlaonadh praghas na dtithe sa tír seo, má tá tú ag smaoineamh teach a cheannach, an modh ceannacháin agus díolacháin títhe agus na costaisí tosaigh atá i gceist
Rented accommodation comes in many forms
Tá go leor cinéail lóistincíosa ann
You can choose from houses, flats, apartments, house-shares and bed-sits, according to what suits your needs and your budget
Beidh tú ábalta roghnú ar thíthe, árasáin, páirtíocht tithíochta agus seomraí suite codlata, ag brath céard a shásaíonn do chuid riachtanaisí féin agus do chuid airigid
You will need to know how these are advertised and rented and what your rights and responsibilities are as a tenant
Caithfidh tú fios a bheith agat cé'n chaoi a bhfuil siad seo fógraithe agus ligthe, agus céard iad do chearta agus do fhreagracht mar thionónta
Local authorities are the main providers of social housing for people who cannot afford to buy their own homes
Níl aon srianta ar cheannacht nó ligean ar cíos maidir le áitreabh cónaithe nó talamh neamthalamhaíochta
There are no restrictions on the purchase or rent of residential property or non-agricultural land. How to apply
Is iad na húdaráis áitiúla is mó a chuireann tithíocht shóisialta ar fáil do dhaoine a dteastaíonn tithe uathu ach nach bhfuil in acmhainn a gcuid tithe féin a cheannach
Threshold is a voluntary organisation that gives information and advice to citizens about rented accommodation
Caithfidh náisiúnaigh neamh-Éireannacha ceart dlíthiúil chun fanacht sa Stát a bheith acu chun cáiliú iarratas ar thithíocht shóisialta a dhéanamh
